item.title: Searching CFEngine documentation
item.description: The CFEngine Reference Manual is extremely useful, and is the ultimate guide to everything about CFEngine. However, it is not always the easiest to find what you are looking for. To help in this respect, I have created a cross-referenced index of all the section headings in the manual. You can search it using the second search box on the right of any page of this site. item.title: cf-cmd: A command-line tool for running CFEngine snippets
item.description: While writing this book, I've had to run hundreds of little CFEngine snippets to run tests, develop examples, verify functionality, or get a solid idea of what some constructs did. After building the typical "test bundle" scaffolding in an editor for the hundredth time, I decided to do something about it. The result is the cf-cmd command. I will let it speak for itself: $ cf-cmd help cf-cmd v1.
